text: 5.6: 1 Ko 7.19; Ga 6.15; Kor 3.11; Ze 2.18-22Guma maaŋ muuŋgip, Krais Zisas phorgɨp kɨrga, mba fooi tɨv, ana fhura ki tɨv ma. Mba gumgi warir fooi fhuv ne, ne vhɨra fhura ki ne ma. Kha tɨv, guma guigira Krais khothɨgap, ana guigira won davar harigi gumgi ga ndɨɨi, mba tɨv ana guigira tɨva guar ma.
